H0.text: Which river runs through Hamburg. Rhine

H1.text: Which river runs through Hamburg. Danube

H2.text: Which river runs through Hamburg. Oder

H3.text: Which river runs through Hamburg. Elbe

A4.text: The Elbe is crossed by many ferries, both passenger and car carrying, in Hamburg's borough of Mitte (centre).

A5.text: The Elbe river... touches... Hamburg on the way, and taking on the waters of the Mulde and Saale from the west, and those of the Schwarze Elster, Havel and Elde from the east.
